alert.note: Alert for Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:50AM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Essex, northern Addison, southern Chittenden and southwestern Washington Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1150 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Westport, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Vergennes, Middlebury, Westport, Weybridge, Monkton Ridge, Lincoln, Monkton, Monkton Boro, New Haven, Addison, Hinesburg, Starksboro, Ferrisburg, Charlotte, Waltham, Bristol, Panton, Mt. Philo State Park, Huntington and Kingsland Bay State Park. This includes Interstate 87 between mile markers 116 and 121. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Addison; Eastern Chittenden; Washington; Western Addison; Western Chittenden
